entry.tran: 程式化的;俗套的;非独创的
entry.def: If you describe a way of saying or doing something as formulaic, you are criticizing it because it is not original and has been used many times before in similar situations.

example.ex: His paintings are contrived and formulaic.
example.tran: 他的绘画作品做作而又俗套。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by or in accordance with some formula
